addr: 560 Northfield Ave. New Education Center. West Orange, NJ 07052
title: Storytime with Mrs. Claus
desc: December 18-23 ~ 5:30pm and 7:30pm Come enjoy a holiday story read by Mrs. Claus and meet one of her animal friends. Light refreshments and? a holiday cookie  included with ticket. Suitable for children ages 12 and younger. Children must be accompanied by a parent or guardian.?All attendants must have a ticket.  Event last approximately 45 minutes.  Space is limited. Children under two are free. This event is part of the Holiday Lights Spectacular at the Essex County Turtle Back Zoo - Take a winter stroll under the sparkling lights of over 50 winter and animal characters illuminated throughout the Zoo. Celebrate the season of giving by bringing donations of non-perishable food items, new toys, and gently used coats. 5pm to 9pm. Open all nights we offer Storytime with Mrs. Claus.
